item_blink.name: Blink Dagger

tooltips.Description:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to [b]1200[/b] units away. \n\nBlink Dagger cannot be used for [b]3.0[/b] seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
tooltips.Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
tooltips.Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
tooltips.Note1: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.

item_blink.active: [h1]Active: Blink[/h1] Teleport to a target point up to [b]1200[/b] units away. \n\nBlink Dagger cannot be used for [b]3.0[/b] seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

item_overwhelming_blink.name: Overwhelming Blink

tooltips.Description:
Active: Overwhelming Blink

Teleport to a target point up to [b]1200[/b] units away. After teleportation, all enemies in a [b][object Object][/b] AoE take damage equal to [b]100[/b] + [b]50[/b]% of your strength and an additional [b]100[/b]% over time, and have [b]50[/b]% movement speed slow and [b]50[/b] attack speed slow for [b]6[/b] seconds. Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for [b]3.0[/b] seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
tooltips.Lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.
tooltips.Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
tooltips.Note1: If you used Overwhelming Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.

tooltips.Description:

Teleport to a target point up to [b]1200[/b] units away. After teleportation, you gain [b]40[/b]% phased movement speed and +[b]35[/b] Agility for [b]6[/b] seconds. Swift Blink cannot be used for [b]3.0[/b] seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
tooltips.Lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.
tooltips.Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
tooltips.Note1: If you used Swift Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.

item_arcane_blink.name: Arcane Blink

tooltips.Description:
Active: Arcane Blink

Teleport to a target point up to [b]1400[/b] units away. After teleportation, you restore [b]200[/b] health and [b]100[/b] mana. Arcane Blink cannot be used for [b]3.0[/b] seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
tooltips.Lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.
tooltips.Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
tooltips.Note1: If you used Arcane Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.

tooltips.Lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

item_javelin.name: Javelin

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a [b]25[/b]% chance to pierce through evasion and deal [b]60[/b] bonus magical damage.
tooltips.Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

item_javelin.passive: [h1]Passive: Pierce[/h1]Grants each attack a [b]25[/b]% chance to pierce through evasion and deal [b]60[/b] bonus magical damage.

tooltips.Lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

item_quelling_blade.name: Quelling Blade

tooltips.Description:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree. Cast Range: [b]350[/b]

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by [b]8[/b] for melee heroes, and [b]4[/b] for ranged.
tooltips.Lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
tooltips.Note0: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.

tooltips.Description:
Use: Imbue

Instantly restores [b]85[/b] health.
tooltips.Lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

item_infused_raindrop.name: Infused Raindrops

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block [b]120[/b] magic damage from damage instances over [b]75[/b] damage. \n\nComes with [b]6[/b] charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
tooltips.Note0: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
tooltips.Lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

item_infused_raindrop.passive: [h1]Passive: Magical Damage Block[/h1] Consumes a charge to block [b]120[/b] magic damage from damage instances over [b]75[/b] damage. \n\nComes with [b]6[/b] charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

tooltips.Description: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
tooltips.Lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

item_stout_shield.name: Stout Shield

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a [b]50[/b]% chance to block [b]20[/b] damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and [b]8[/b] damage on ranged.
tooltips.Lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
tooltips.Note0: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.

item_stout_shield.passive: [h1]Passive: Damage Block[/h1]Grants a [b]50[/b]% chance to block [b]20[/b] damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and [b]8[/b] damage on ranged.

item_moon_shard.name: Moon Shard

tooltips.Description:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain [b]60[/b] attack speed and [b]200[/b] bonus night vision. Max 1 use.\n\n

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants bonus night vision.
tooltips.Lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

item_moon_shard.use: [h1]Use: Consume[/h1] Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain [b]60[/b] attack speed and [b]200[/b] bonus night vision. Max 1 use.\n\n

tooltips.Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

item_branches.name: Iron Branch

tooltips.Description:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]
tooltips.Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

item_branches.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

tooltips.Lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
tooltips.of_travel_Description: Reduces TP cooldown by %tp_cooldown_reduction% seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.

tooltips.Lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by [b]40[/b]%.
tooltips.Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

item_lifesteal.passive: [h1]Passive: Lifesteal[/h1]Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by [b]40[/b]%.

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Spell Lifesteal

Spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. \n\nLifesteal reduced against creeps.
tooltips.Lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

item_voodoo_mask.passive: [h1]Passive: Spell Lifesteal[/h1]Spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  \n\nLifesteal reduced against creeps.

tooltips.of_elves_Lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
tooltips.of_bearing_Description:
Active: Endurance

Gives +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed and +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%% movement speed to nearby allies for %duration% seconds. For the first %bonus_ms_duration% seconds allies are immune to slows. Radius: %radius%

Passive: Swiftness Aura

Grants %aura_movement_speed% movement speed to allies. Radius: %radius%
tooltips.of_bearing_Lore: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.

item_gem.name: Gem of True Sight

tooltips.Description:
Active: Reveal

Gives True Sight over a [b][object Object][/b] radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.

Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within [b]900[/b] range of its carrier.

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
tooltips.Note0: Disabled while on a courier.
tooltips.Lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

tooltips.Note0: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

tooltips.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
tooltips.Note0: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
tooltips.Note1: Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.

tooltips.Description:
Use: Reveal

For [b]12[/b] seconds, creates an area that reveals and slows invisible heroes by [b]-20[/b]% in a [b][object Object][/b] radius where the caster was standing. Invisible units revealed by dust take [b]25[/b] damage.\n\n The debuff effect on enemies lingers for [b]8[/b]s after leaving the area of effect.
tooltips.Note0: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
tooltips.Lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

item_bottle.name: Bottle

tooltips.Description:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore [b]110[/b] health and [b]60[/b] mana over [b]2.7[/b] seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost. The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain. Hold Control to use on an allied hero. Range: [b]350[/b]

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds. Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
tooltips.Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
tooltips.Note0: Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
tooltips.Note1: Using a stored Bounty or Water rune fully refills the bottle if the bottle was full when the rune was stored; otherwise, it refills two charges.

item_courier.name: Animal Courier

tooltips.Description:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
tooltips.Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

tooltips.Lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

item_tpscroll.name: Town Portal Scroll

tooltips.Description:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for [b]3.0[/b] seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. \n\nDouble-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
tooltips.Note0: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
tooltips.Note1: Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.
tooltips.Lore: What a hero truly needs.
tooltips.2_Description:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for [b]3.0[/b] seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building, unit or hero. \n\nDouble-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

Intelligence

Once fully charged, deals [b]125[/b] to [b]2[/b] random targets in [b]700[/b] range every [b]4[/b] seconds.

Strength

Once fully charged an attack has a [b]20[/b]% chance to deal [b]80[/b] bonus damage and root the target for [b]1.0[/b] seconds. [b]4[/b]s Cooldown.

Agility

Once fully charged, when attacked, the hero has a [b]20[/b] to counter-attack a target within their attack range. [b]4[/b]s Cooldown.

Enemy units take [b]50[/b] magical damage upon landing.

Range: [b]550[/b]
Dispel Type: [b]Basic Dispel[/b]

Increases targeted spell and item cast range.

item_aether_lens.passive: [h1]Passive: Aethereal Focus[/h1] Increases targeted spell and item cast range.

item_force_staff.name: Force Staff

tooltips.Description:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit [b]600[/b] units in the direction it is facing. \n\nRange: [b]550[/b]
tooltips.Lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
tooltips.Note0: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
tooltips.Note1: Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
tooltips.Note2: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.

item_hurricane_pike.name: Hurricane Pike

tooltips.Description:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy [b]450[/b] units away from each other, and for [b]6[/b] seconds, allows you to make [b]5[/b] attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +[b]100[/b] attack speed. Can be cast on self or allies to push the target [b]600[/b] units in the direction it is facing. Enemy Range: [b]450[/b]

Increases attack range of ranged heroes.

tooltips.Note0: Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
tooltips.Note1: Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
tooltips.Note2: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.

item_necronomicon.name: Necronomicon

tooltips.Description:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for [b]60[/b] seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3. Health: [b]800 1200 1600[/b] Damage: [b]25 45 65[/b] Mana Break Damage: [b]30 40 50[/b] Last Will Damage: [b]600 700 800[/b]

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3. Health: [b]800 1200 1600[/b] Damage: [b]37 57 75[/b] Aura Move Speed: [b]5 7 9[/b] Aura Radius: [b]1200[/b]
tooltips.Lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants [b]30[/b] attack speed and [b]5[/b] armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by [b]-5[/b].\n\nRadius: [b]1200[/b]
tooltips.Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

item_assault.passive: [h1]Passive: Assault Aura[/h1] Grants [b]30[/b] attack speed and [b]5[/b] armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by [b]-5[/b].\n\nRadius: [b]1200[/b]

item_black_king_bar.name: Black King Bar

tooltips.Description:
Active: Avatar

Applies a basic dispel. Grants [b]60[/b]% Magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage. For the duration of the effect, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect. Duration: [b]9 8 7 6[/b] Dispel Type: [b]Basic Dispel[/b]
tooltips.Lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
tooltips.Note0: Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
tooltips.Note1: Abilities that pierce magic immunity will work fully even when Avatar is activated

item_aegis.name: Aegis of the Immortal

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana [b]5.0[/b] seconds after you die, at the location where you died. \n\nReincarnation must be used within [b]5[/b] minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
tooltips.Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
tooltips.Note0: Pronounced as ayy jis.

tooltips.Description:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that causes enemies to take [b]15[/b]% more damage from spells for [b]16.0[/b] seconds, deals [b]200[/b] magical damage and slows their movement by [b]-40[/b]% for [b]4.0[/b] seconds. Deals [b]150[/b]% damage to illusions. Radius: [b][object Object][/b]

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by [b]-45[/b] and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by [b]25[/b]%. Radius: [b]1200[/b]
tooltips.Lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
tooltips.Note0: The wave extends at a speed of [b]400[/b] to a max size of [b][object Object][/b].
tooltips.Note1: The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
tooltips.Note2: Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

item_aeon_disk.name: Aeon Disk

tooltips.Description:
Passive: Combo Breaker

When you take damage and your health falls below [b]70[/b]%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a [b]2.5[/b] second buff that provides +[b]75[/b]% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. Cooldown increases every time it triggers.

Dispel Type: [b]Strong Dispel[/b]
tooltips.lore: A powerful artifact long ago smuggled out of the Ivory Incubarium. Or so many believe.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within [b]1400[/b] units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge. Cast Range: [b]750[/b]
tooltips.lore: Forged by a god to entrap the soul of another.

item_blade_mail.name: Blade Mail

tooltips.Description:

tooltips.Note2: Returned damage type is the same as it was received.

item_rapier.name: Divine Rapier

tooltips.Description:
Toggle: Transmute

Toggle to gain either [b]25[/b]% bonus spell amplification or [b]250[/b] bonus attack damage.

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
tooltips.Note0: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
tooltips.Lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

tooltips.Note0: Has a [b]0.3[/b] second fade time.
tooltips.Note1: If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.

tooltips.Description:

Also provides the unit with +[b]25[/b] base attack damage, +[b]12[/b] health regen, +[b]4[/b] mana regen and +[b]4[/b] armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than [b]1000[/b] retain their original max health. Grants the caster the gold bounty of the dominated creep. Dominated unit's bounty is set to [b]100[/b] gold. Range: [b]700[/b]
tooltips.Lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
tooltips.Note0: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
tooltips.Note1: Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
tooltips.Note2: Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.

Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.
